com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.subordinate.builder

Interface BooleanExpression

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompareExpression, GroupExpression

    public interface BooleanExpression
extends Serializable
    This interfaces marks an operand which evaluates to a Boolean value.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis, Jonathan Austin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Condition build() 
      Boolean evaluate()
      Evaluates and returns the value of this operand.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        Condition build()
        Returns:
        the subordinate condition for this expression

      • evaluate

        Boolean evaluate()
        Evaluates and returns the value of this operand. This method is only used for internal testing purposes, as the actual expression will be "compiled" to a subordinate for application use.
        Returns:
        the value of this operand.
